quotes: Do not be satisfied with the stories that come before you. Unfold your own myth
The wound is the place where the light enters you
What you seek is seeking you
Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself
Raise your words, not your voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder
Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray
Don’t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form
Be like a tree and let the dead leaves drop
Be patient where you sit in the dark. The dawn is coming
When the soul lies down in that grass, the world is too full to talk about
Try not to resist the changes that come your way. Instead, let life live through you
Wear gratitude like a cloak and it will feed every corner of your life
Why do you stay in prison when the door is wide open?
You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?
Come, come, whoever you are. Wanderer, worshiper, lover of leaving. It doesn't matter. Ours is not a caravan of despair
Close your eyes, fall in love, stay there
You have within you more love than you could ever understand
Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion
If everything around you seems dark, look again. You may be the light
Don’t get lost in your pain, know that one day your pain will become your cure
The moment you accept what troubles you've been given, the door will open
Be empty of worrying. Think of who created thought!
If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?
Don’t be satisfied with stories, how things have gone with others. Unfold your own myth
Let the beauty we love be what we do. There are hundreds of ways to kneel and kiss the ground
When the soul sees the soul, it smiles
This moment is all there is
Inside you, there's an artist you don't know about
Be like the sun for grace and mercy. Be like the night to cover others' faults
You were sent here to be alive. To love. To open your heart
Look past your thoughts, so you may drink the pure nectar of this moment
Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it
Silence is the language of God. All else is poor translation
With life as short as a half-taken breath, don’t plant anything but love
Do not worry if all the candles in the world flicker and die. We have the spark that starts the fire
When the soul awakens, the search begins, and you can never go back
Be drunk with love, for love is all that exists
Gamble everything for love, if you are a true human being
Let your soul be your pilot
Be grateful for whoever comes, because each has been sent as a guide from beyond
Why should I be unhappy? Every parcel of my being is in full bloom
You were born with potential. You were born with goodness and trust
Move, but don’t move the way fear makes you move
Sit, be still, and listen, because you’re drunk and we’re at the edge of the roof
Be a lamp, or a lifeboat, or a ladder
You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop
Love is the bridge between you and everything
Wherever you stand, be the soul of that place
Travel brings power and love back into your life
Let yourself be drawn by the stronger pull of that which you truly love
